About me

"Here I will talk about myself in the third person."

Rohan Das is young and passionate Python coder, who has a good command in Python, HTML, CSS. Also, he is a creative graphic designer and enthusiastic techie who has a YouTube channel where he discusses tech-stuff. For more information, you can contact me via mail and social media.

Skills

Python

I'm a passionate python coder. I like to code on my free time. I have created few repositories on github, which I made using Python language. One of them include a game which I made in less than 200 words. I like to code in a short and sweet way.

Web Development

I have a good command in HTML And CSS too. I can create static and dynamic websites using Jekyll, Flask and Django.

Graphic Designing

I am a Passionate Graphics Designer too. I Love to use Photoshop and experiment with different styles.
